descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]Description[/b][/color]
This mod will add 4 new essential followers to Dragonsreach in Whiterun.

[color=red][b]What do they do?[/b][/color]
[color=red]Andrel[/color] is a frost mage with healing abilities.
[color=red]Aumsi[/color] is a fire mage with healing abilities.
[color=red]Gronak[/color] is a warrior who wields axe and shield.
[color=red]Jo\'Rakha[/color] is a Kahjiit theif who dual wields axes.

Andrel and Aumsi will never use bows.

[color=red][b] Compatibility[/b][/color]
There should be no issues with any other mods.
The only issue would be if you have my previous extra follower mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9981]Gronak - A new companion[/url]. If you have that mod, uninstall it before using this mod.

[color=red][b]Remember to send these companions home before uninstalling the mod, or you will not be able to pick up another companion![/b][/color]

[color=red][b]Steam Link[/b][/color]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13403]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13403[/url]

[color=red][b]Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO[/url] with this mod to teach new abilities to the companions and have them all follow you at once.[/b][/color]
author: Maddo3
